message.content:
Probabilistic Methods, Reinforcement Learning. 

Probabilistic Methods: The paper uses a hidden-state reinforcement learning paradigm based on the Partially Observable Markov Decision Process (POMDP) to implement visual attention. 

Reinforcement Learning: The attention module selects targets to foveate based on the goal of successful recognition, and uses a new multiple-model Q-learning formulation. The paper also mentions using reinforcement learning to guide the active camera to foveate salient features.
